mapper.select:
select hosp_id as hospId, cl_cd as clCd, addr, cl_cd_nm as clCdNm, emdong_nm as emdongNm, estb_dd as estbDd, hosp_url as hospUrl, post_no as postNo, sggu_cd as sgguCd, sggu_cd_nm as sgguCdNm, sido_cd as sidoCd, sido_cd_nm as sidoCdNm, telno, yadm_nm as yadmNm, ykiho, hosp_status as hospStatus
from TB_HOSPITAL_MASTER

select user_id as userId, provider_id as providerId, email as email, username as username, phone as phone, role as role, provider as provider, status as status, zipcode as zipcode, address_line1 as addressLine1, address_line2 as addressLine2, city as city, state as state, created_at as createdAt, created_by as createdBy, modified_at as modifiedAt, modified_by as modifiedBy from TB_USER_MASTER;

select hosp_reservation_id as hospReservationId, reservation_at as reservationAt, reservation_time as reservationTime, created_at as createdAt, modified_at as modifiedAt, reservation_status as reservationStatus, user_id as userId, payment_id as paymentId, hosp_id as hospId from TB_HOSPITAL_RESERVATION_HISTORY;
